entry.source: 〉 There is a statue of a dog here...{F801}{F802}〉 Some kind of power makes it look{F801}as if the statue has three heads...{F801}{F802}〉 Do you want to call upon Cerberus?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There is a statue of a dog here...{F801}{F802}〉 Some kind of power makes it look{F801}as if the statue has three heads...{F801}{F802}〉 Do you want to call upon Cerberus?{F801}

entry.source: Yes{F801}No{F801}
entry.target: Yes{F801}No{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} called Cerberus.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} called Cerberus.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon's voice\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}WHERE YOU LOOK!?{F801}ME OVER HERE!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon's voice\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}WHERE YOU LOOK!?{F801}ME OVER HERE!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Cerberus has appeared.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Cerberus has appeared.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}WHAT YOU WANT, HUMAN?{F801}{F802}IF YOU BORING, I EAT YOU WHOLE.{F801}ME WARN YOU.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}WHAT YOU WANT, HUMAN?{F801}{F802}IF YOU BORING, I EAT YOU WHOLE.{F801}ME WARN YOU.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} asked Cerberus not to{F801}come near the city anymore.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} asked Cerberus not to{F801}come near the city anymore.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494005}WHAT!? YOU SAY WE BROTHERS TOO HOT{F801}YOU TO HANDLE, YOU WANT... US LEAVE?{F801}{F802}RUDE! WE GO WHERE WE PLEASE!{F801}{F802}IF HUMANS DIE, IT BECAUSE THEY WEAK.{F801}NO MATTER TO US.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494005}WHAT!? YOU SAY WE BROTHERS TOO HOT{F801}YOU TO HANDLE, YOU WANT... US LEAVE?{F801}{F802}RUDE! WE GO WHERE WE PLEASE!{F801}{F802}IF HUMANS DIE, IT BECAUSE THEY WEAK.{F801}NO MATTER TO US.{F801}

entry.source: Force them to obey{F801}Try to talk some more{F801}
entry.target: Force them to obey{F801}Try to talk some more{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}GWAHAHAHAHA! VERY GOOD.{F801}LET ME SEE YOU TRY!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}GWAHAHAHAHA! VERY GOOD.{F801}LET ME SEE YOU TRY!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} left the area...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} left the area...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Would you like to call Cerberus?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Would you like to call Cerberus?{F801}

entry.source: Yes{F801}No{F801}
entry.target: Yes{F801}No{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The area has been sealed off by the{F801}demon's Domain.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The area has been sealed off by the{F801}demon's Domain.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,502044}I have located the signal of the{F801}escaped demon.{F801}{F802}I'll display it on the navigation map.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,502044}I have located the signal of the{F801}escaped demon.{F801}{F802}I'll display it on the navigation map.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,502044}I still have a lock on the demon's{F801}signal.{F801}{F802}If you want to defeat this demon,{F801}I suggest you remain on the defensive{F801}while pursuing it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}ERF...{F801}YOU CATCH ME.{F801}{F802}YOU PRETTY STRONG. SO WILD.{F801}ME LIKE THAT.{F801}{F802}AS PROMISE, I STOP RUNNING AROUND{F801}HERE.{F801}{F802}GOODBYE, WILD HUMAN.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cerberus\0{F87A,-254}{F813,1,494000}ERF...{F801}YOU CATCH ME.{F801}{F802}YOU PRETTY STRONG. SO WILD.{F801}ME LIKE THAT.{F801}{F802}AS PROMISE, I STOP RUNNING AROUND{F801}HERE.{F801}{F802}GOODBYE, WILD HUMAN.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon leaves...{F801}
